wisu daksha waidyawarayaku lesa salakena rawana raju wisin ramapathini sithawa paharagath awasthawe aya bera ganimata rama kumaru samaga hanuman pramukha wanara senawak pamini athara ema satanin rama parshawaya jaya laba gaththa.ehidi miyagiya wanara senawata shakra dewiyan wisin amruthaya isa nawatha jiwaya laba dun bawath ,owunge siruren bima watunu amruthayen "amrutha"paryaya darana rasakinda nipan bawath janaprawadayehi sandahan.
